title: Comprehensive Detox Kit
description: The Comprehensive Detox Kit by Desbio facilitates the weight loss and drainage of the entire body.
cleaned_text: $ 154.95 $ 0.00 Comprehensive Detox Kit The Comprehensive Detox Kit is our Homeopathic Detox Kit facilitates the detoxification and drainage of the entire body. This complete protocol serves as the starting place for all other Desbio programs, including other forms of detox and our hA2cg Evolution Weight Management Program. All six DesBio homeopathic remedies are constructed with 6 different phases of homeopathy (plants, minerals, catalysts, phenolics, bowel nosodes, and sarcodes) put together in Desbio chords and Burgi group serial dilutions for enhanced effectiveness.
